errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size: {{maxSize}}

upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here

dashboard.title: Data Import
dashboard.description: Import your data from CSV or Excel files
dashboard.continueImporting: Continue importing to complete your data migration
dashboard.howItWorksDescription: Follow these simple steps to import your data safely and accurately.
dashboard.step1: Select the type of data you want to import
dashboard.step2: Upload your CSV or Excel file
dashboard.step3: Map your columns to the required fields
dashboard.step4: Review and fix any validation errors, then import
dashboard.tip1: Ensure your file has headers in the first row
dashboard.tip2: Use the provided templates for best results
dashboard.tip3: Import partners and products before stock levels or opening balances

upload.title: Upload your file
upload.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing your data. The first row should contain column headers.
upload.dropzone: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse

mapping.title: Map your columns
mapping.description: Match the columns in your file to the required system fields. Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*).

validation.title: Review validation results
validation.description: Review any errors found during validation. You can fix errors directly in the grid below or proceed with valid rows only.

execute.title: Import your data
execute.description: Review the summary below and start the import when ready.

complete.title: Import Complete!
complete.description: Your data has been successfully imported.

wizard.proceedWithErrors: Some rows have validation errors and will be skipped. Do you want to proceed with valid rows only?

validation.allValidDescription: Your data passed all validation checks and is ready to import.

history.title: Import History
history.description: View all past import jobs and their results
history.noJobsDescription: Start by importing some data from the import dashboard.
